title:
Engine and Transmission, Remove and Install (Z20
LET)

steps.text: Raise vehicle
Remove engine undertray (1)
Remove exhaust pipe undertray (2)
Drain coolant system

substeps.text: Remove lower hose from radiator feed hose

steps.text: Drain transmission fluid
Release support bracket for auxiliary cooling pump
Lower vehicle
Disconnect battery negative lead

substeps.text: Release windscreen washer bottle (1) position to one side

steps.text: Remove engine cover

substeps.text: Apply match mark to engine cover 2x hinge

steps.text: Disconnect harness connector (1) from mass air flow meter, temperature sensor
Disconnect air intake hose from air cleaner housing
Disconnect engine breather hose from air intake hose
Disconnect air intake hose from turbocharger
Remove support bracket for air intake hose and lifting eye from engine
Disconnect aeration hose (2) from engine
Disconnect coolant top hose (3) from engine
Disconnect vacuum hose (1) from turbocharger
Disconnect engine harness from body harness, right side of engine compartment
Disconnect air intake hose (3) from throttle body
Disconnect vacuum hose from vacuum unit of switchover valve
Disconnect vacuum hose (5) from throttle body housing
Disconnect coolant overflow hose (4) from engine assembly
Release fuel pressure from fuel rail

substeps.text: Remove cap from pressure relief valve (1)
Install fuel Pressure Test Equipment KM-J34730-91 to pressure relief valve
Bleed pressure from fuel rail at pressure relief valve

steps.text: Remove fuel Pressure Test Equipment KM-J34730-91 from pressure relief valve

substeps.text: Install cap to pressure relief valve (1)

steps.text: Release fuel feed hose from fuel rail
Release fuel return hose from fuel rail
Disconnect vacuum hose for brake servo from inlet manifold
Disconnect lower coolant hose from coolant expansion tank
Remove coolant expansion tank from support bracket

substeps.text: Release harness connector for level sensor

steps.text: Disconnect hose of distribution housing from auxiliary coolant pump
Disconnect lower coolant hose from oil cooler and throttle body
Disconnect body/engine harness from support bracket of expansion tank
Release harness from coolant hose
Disconnect earth cable of body harness from inlet manifold
Disconnect main engine harness from body harness, left side of engine compartment
Disconnect and remove auxiliary coolant pump and bracket from vehicle
Disconnect clutch slave cylinder

substeps.text:
Position to one side
 Note:   Fluid leaks, use
collecting container.

steps.text: Disconnect lower coolant hose from distribution piece
Disconnect turbocharger coolant hose from lower coolant hose
Release 2x gearshift cable
Raise vehicle to suitable working height
Remove 2x rear road wheel

substeps.text: Use special socket located under front bonnet

steps.text: Remove, hub nut for left rear wheel
Release left drive shaft from hub
Disconnect left ABS harness from ABS sensor (1)
Release left brake hose clip (3) from lower wishbone
Release left brake cable (4) from left brake caliper
Remove left brake caliper (5) from left disc hub

substeps.text: Position, then support caliper to one side

steps.text: Disconnect track control arm, left (2) from chassis

substeps.text: Release lock nut for track control arm

steps.text: Release left carrier for upper ball joint (6) from left wheel hub

substeps.text: Release 4x shim and bracket for ABS sensor

steps.text: Release left lower wishbone from chassis
Release left shock absorber from chassis
Remove left rear disc hub, shock absorber, track control arm, lower wishbone assembly Note: 2x technician required.
Remove left driveshaft from vehicle
Remove right rear disc hub, shock absorber, track control arm, lower wishbone assembly
Release oxygen sensor harness from left rear chassis
Release oxygen sensor harness from heat shield for catalytic converter
Raise vehicle
Remove secondary catalytic converter (1) for exhaust

substeps.text: Remove gasket (4) from front joint, then discard

steps.text: Release 2x gearshift cable from engine support bracket
Remove intake air hose from intercooler and turbocharger
Release tension from and remove ribbed V-belt
Remove idler pulley assembly (1) for ribbed V-belt
Remove right driveshaft heatshield for rear engine mount
Disconnect right body harness from alternator
Disconnect body harness connector from oil pressure sensor
Release body harness from support bracket for oil pipe
Release body harness from support bracket for vacuum tank
Disconnect body harness from starter motor
Disconnect earth of body harness from engine block
Disconnect harness connector from switchover valve for intake manifold
Disconnect harness connector from reverse light switch
Lower vehicle
Release body harness from transmission bracket
Remove upper 2x bolt from reaction mount bracket, lower, at front of chassis
Release upper engine mount, right
Release upper engine mount, left (1)
Raise vehicle
Install and set Engine Support Tool KM-6054 (1), use with Adapter KM-904 (2)
Remove lower reaction mount, rear, from between transmission and rear chassis
Remove lower reaction mount, front, from between transmission and front chassis
Remove reaction mount bracket from lower front chassis
Remove engine and transmission from vehicle
Install engine and transmission to vehicle
Install reaction mount bracket, to lower front chassis

substeps.text: Recut 2x bolt thread, use recommended locking compound if not

steps.text: Install reaction mount, lower front, to between transmission housing and front chassis

substeps.text: Recut 2x bolt thread, use recommended locking compound if not
Install new engine mount centre bolt and nut hand tight

steps.text: Install reaction mount, lower rear, to between transmission and rear chassis

substeps.text: Recut 3x bolt thread, use recommended locking compound if not
Install new engine mount centre bolt, nut hand tight

steps.text: Remove Engine and Transmission Support Tool KM-6054 (1) with Adapter KM-904 (2)
Lower vehicle
Install upper engine mount, left

substeps.text: Recut 3x bolt thread, use recommended locking compound if not

steps.text: Install upper engine mount, right

substeps.text: Recut 3x bolt thread, use recommended locking compound if not

steps.text: Install lower reaction mount bracket, front, 2x bolt

substeps.text: Recut 2x thread, use recommended locking compound if not

steps.text: Secure engine mount bolt, right upper
Secure engine mount bolt, left upper
Position body harness to transmission bracket
Raise vehicle
Secure reaction mount bracket, lower front
Secure reaction mount bracket, lower front
Secure reaction mount bracket, lower front
Secure reaction mount bracket, lower rear
Connect body harness connector to reversing light switch
Connect body harness connector to switchover valve for intake manifold
Connect body harness earth to engine block
Connect body harness to starter motor
Install body harness to support bracket for vacuum tank
Install body harness to support bracket for oil pipe
Connect body harness connector to oil pressure sensor
Connect body harness to alternator
Install right driveshaft heatshield to rear reaction mount
Install idler pulley assembly for ribbed V-belt
Install ribbed V-belt, then apply tension - see operation “Ribbed V-belt Tension, Check”
Connect intake air hose to intercooler and turbocharger
Install auxiliary coolant pump to transmission housing
Install secondary catalytic converter for exhaust

substeps.text: Install new gasket to front joint

steps.text: Connect harness connector for auxiliary pump
Lower vehicle
Secure reaction mount bracket, lower front
Secure auxiliary coolant pump to transmission housing
Raise vehicle to suitable working height
Install harness to rear silencer heatshield for oxygen sensor installed to secondary catalytic converter
Install left driveshaft
Install left rear disc, hub, shock absorber, control arm and lower wishbone assembly Note: 2x technician required.
Secure left shock absorber to chassis
Secure left lower wishbone to chassis

substeps.text: Install new locking tag to nut

steps.text: Install end of track control arm to left chassis
Install ball joint carrier, left upper, to lower wishbone assembly

substeps.text: Install 4x shim and bracket for ABS sensor connector
Recut 2x bolt thread, use recommended locking compound if not

steps.text: Install brake caliper to left disc hub
Install left brake cable to left brake caliper
Install brake hose clip to lower wishbone
Connect harness connector to left ABS sensor
Install washer, hub nut for left rear wheel
Install right rear disc, hub, shock absorber, control arm and lower wishbone assembly
Secure 2x rear wheel hub nut 235 Nm
Install 2x rear road wheel
Lower vehicle
Install 2x gearshift cable
Install turbocharger coolant hose to coolant bottom hose
Connect coolant lower hose to distribution housing
Install coolant main lower hose to oil cooler
Install clutch slave cylinder, pipe
Install auxiliary coolant pump hose to distribution housing
Connect body harness to switchover valve for intake manifold
Connect main engine harness to main body harness, left side of engine compartment
Connect body harness earth to inlet manifold
Install harness to coolant hose
Connect body engine harness to support bracket for expansion tank
Connect coolant hose for auxiliary pump to distribution housing
Install coolant expansion tank to support bracket

substeps.text: Install harness connector for level sensor

steps.text: Connect coolant lower hose to expansion tank
Connect vacuum hose for brake servo to inlet manifold
Install fuel return hose to fuel rail
Install fuel feed hose to fuel rail
Connect coolant overflow hose to engine assembly
Connect vacuum hose to throttle body housing
Connect vacuum hose to vacuum unit of switchover valve

substeps.text: Secure vacuum hose to alternator bracket

steps.text: Connect upper intercooler hose to throttle body
Connect engine harness from body harness, right side of engine compartment
Connect vacuum hose to turbocharger
Connect upper coolant hose to throttle body
Connect aeration hose to engine
Install air support bracket, air intake hose for lifting eye to engine

substeps.text: Recut bolt thread, use recommended locking compound if not

steps.text: Install air intake hose assembly to between air cleaner and turbocharger
Connect engine breather hose to air intake hose
Install air intake hose to air cleaner housing
Install mass air flow meter, temperature sensor connector
Bleed clutch - see operation “Hydraulic Clutch, Bleed” Note: 2x technician required.
Install engine cover
Connect battery negative lead
Raise vehicle
Replenish transmission fluid

substeps.text: Fill to level of plug aperture

steps.text: Connect lower hose for radiator feed
Lower vehicle
Replenish coolant fluid - see operation “Cooling System, Drain, Fill and Bleed”
Program all volatile memories
Run engine and check for leaks
Raise vehicle
Install exhaust pipe undertray
Install engine undertray
Lower vehicle

torqueValues.component: Drain transmission fluid
Secure engine mount bolt, right upper
Secure engine mount bolt, left upper
Secure reaction mount bracket, lower front
Secure reaction mount bracket, lower front
Secure reaction mount bracket, lower front
Secure reaction mount bracket, lower front
Secure reaction mount bracket, lower front
Secure reaction mount bracket, lower rear
Secure reaction mount bracket, lower rear
Install idler pulley assembly for ribbed V-belt
Secure reaction mount bracket, lower front
Secure left shock absorber to chassis
Secure left lower wishbone to chassis
Install end of track control arm to left chassis
Install ball joint carrier, left upper, to lower wishbone assembly
Install brake caliper to left disc hub
Install brake caliper to left disc hub
Install brake hose clip to lower wishbone
Secure 2x rear wheel hub nut 235 Nm
Install 2x rear road wheel
Replace drain plug when drained 35 Nm
Secure 3x bolt (1) 49 Nm
Secure 2x bolt 25 Nm
Secure centre bolt, nut 86 Nm
Install 3x bolt 20 Nm
Install bolt, nut 45 Nm
Install front bolt, nut 65 Nm
Secure new locking nut 9 Nm
Tighten 8x bolt, 2x security bolt 90 Nm

warnings:
A four-post hoist must
be used to raise the vehicle when removing the engine undertray and
diffuser panel. The vehicle can be moved to a two-post hoist for
other operations if required.

Observe relevant
environmental regulations when disposing of used coolant and
lubricants.

Install new blanking
plug to open connections on fuel rail. Do not install previously
used blanking plug.

End of track control
arm locates into chassis. Ensure correct new locking nut is used.
Early type have coarse thread, later type have fine thread.
notes:
Remove 6x bolt, 6x washer, 2x shim
 Shims will vary
for cover alignment.
 Note:   2x technician
required.

Disconnect 2x connector
 Located on roll
bar stay

Move harness to engine
 Located on
expansion tank bracket

Position to one side
 Fluid leaks, use
collecting container.

Remove left rear disc hub, shock absorber, track control arm,
lower wishbone assembly
 2x technician
required.

Follow sequence for left side
 2x technician
required

Remove gasket (4) from front joint, then discard
 Illustration
shows exhaust removed for clarity.

Remove 3x bolt
 Bolts are of
different length, so note position for assembly.

Install 2x lower bolt hand tight
 Bracket can only
be fitted one way.

Install 3x bolt, hand tight
 Use trolley jack
to align 2x top mount to engine and engine mount bracket, lower
front, 2x bolt.

Secure nut
 Nut has copper
coating.

Install left rear disc, hub, shock absorber, control arm and
lower wishbone assembly
 2x technician
required.

Connect 4x harness connector
 Located on
expansion tank bracket

Secure union
 Remove caps from
fuel rail and feed return hoses.

Connect 2x connector
 Located on right
roll bar stay

Bleed clutch - see operation “Hydraulic Clutch,
Bleed”

required.

Install 2x shim, 6x washer, 6x bolt
